activities: We provide a physician-ordered blood test, EarlyCDT-Lung, used to aid in the early detection and risk assessment of lung cancer in high risk patients.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal health information submitted to us at time of test order submittal. This information may be electronic or paper.
recoursemech: We encourage individuals to contact us should any issues arise. We provide company contact information on our website and in the Safe Harbor policy. We encourage this approach prior to contacting any third party resolution organizations. We are willing to work with these third parties as noted in our policy statement.If a complaint or dispute cannot be resolved through our internal process, we agree to dispute resolution using (JAMS or the American Arbitration Association or equivalent) as a third party
